Row.Text: Bulgarian Unique Cavalry Unit. Ignores Rough Terrain for movement and opposing unit’s combat. +3 Combat Strength when this unit is fighting on Rough Terrain. Ignore Zone of Control.

Bulgarian Unique Army Commander. Has 3 Movement. Units in its command radius can pillage for 1 Movement.
